channel.title: Auto kicked when I log in with my new client :{
channel.description: I use a ddsspeced source - I downloaded the pwnscape 3 client, and i try to log on, and i log in for about 2 seconds, than get auto kicked. Can somebody point me in the right direction so I can know how to fix this?

item.title: Auto kicked when I log in with my new client :{
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

If it says, packet lost type 2 refreshing connection, do this

open player.java
add public int skulls = 0; public int hint = 0;

find

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

replace it with

playerProps.writeByte(skulls); playerProps.writeByte(hint); playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

to fix the headicons

public void checkHead

replace the whole code with this

public void checkHead(){ if(!isSkulled){ headIcon = 0; } if(isSkulled){ headIcon = 0; } } public void getHead(){ if(ProtMage && !isSkulled) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange && !isSkulled) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee && !isSkulled) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution && !isSkulled) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption && !isSkulled) headIcon = 32; if(Smite && !isSkulled) headIcon = 16; if(ProtMage && isSkulled) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange && isSkulled) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee && isSkulled) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution && isSkulled) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption && isSkulled) headIcon = 32; if(Smite && isSkulled) headIcon = 16; else if(!ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite) skulls = 1; }

to make equipment interface work

add this in clickingmost

case 64073: c.showInteface(16460); break;

Credits
Bluur-roon~s3rver
T i p-roon~s3rver

Read full topic

I don’t know where in the server to change it though
